Information which is published on Mannheimer Swartling’s website is only intended as general information and does not constitute, and is not to be used as, professional legal advice. There is a risk that the content of this website is neither exhaustive nor completely updated. Any use of information on this website is done at the user’s own risk. Mannheimer Swartling is not responsible for, and has no obligations as regards, information on Mannheimer Swartling’s website or information on another website with a link to or from Mannheimer Swartling’s website.

Intellectual property rights

MANNHEIMER SWARTLING, MSA and the rectangular ”M” design are trademarks or registered trademarks being the property of Mannheimer Swartling. Mannheimer Swartling reserves all rights to the mentioned trademarks.

Information which is published on Mannheimer Swartling’s website belongs to Mannheimer Swartling or is used with the permission of the rights holder. Making of copies, presentations, distribution, display or any other transfer of the information on the website to the public is, except for strictly private use, prohibited unless done with the consent of Mannheimer Swartling.
